attributes.review: He is very selfish and has to have things go his way. Ya he’s the president, but he shouldn’t get rid of the things we love like Tik tok. Tik tok has been apart of everyone’s lives. It’s a really fun app and everyone on there can say that

attributes.review: this app literally spit on my face and called me the f slur. it keeps trying to kick me out! the application tried to insinuate that i “find another app if i didn’t like this one”. so poorly managed! -10/10 do not recommend
